name: untrimmed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having been trimmed (= made tidier or more level by having a small amount cut off it): He was very pale, with his long brown hair, untrimmed, hanging loose about him. With his thick white hair and untrimmed beard he looked like an amiable Santa.
especially of meat, not having had the parts that are not wanted cut off it: I started with a five-pound piece of untrimmed, grass-fed beef.
More examplesFewer examplesHis hair was white, his beard untrimmed, his gaze wary. You'll need 1 large red onion, 1 yellow pepper, and 8 untrimmed spring onions (including the green tops).Untrimmed pork belly with the rind left on is one of the fattiest cuts you can buy.
